Package GUIPackage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutWindow
    This is a simple GUI window Class that contains overview about the author for the user in 5 different languages (English, French, German and Spanish)
    DecryptionWindow
    This is DecryptionWindow Class that provides a UI for the user to do the decryption it contains static methods and fields for direct access and invoking
    EncryptionWindow
    This is EncryptionWindow Class that provides a UI for the user to do the encryption it contains static methods and fields for direct access and invoking
    GuiListener
    This is GuiListener Class that implements ActionListener interface It listens to all actions in all GUI Windows and acts upon them Is listens to the actions performed by pressing the buttons on the UI in particular This class is the soul of the program
    HowToUseWindow
    This is a simple GUI window Class that contains information about how to use this program for the user in 5 different languages (English, French, German and Spanish)
    LanguageWindow
    This is a LanguageWindow Class it creates a simple-small window to let the user choose the language they want The supported Languages are (English, French, German, and Spanish)
    MainMenuWindow
    This is MainMenuWindow Class It create the main menu of this app that contains the main 5 options: Encryption, Decryption, How To Use, About , Exit.
    SplashScreen
    Splash Screen Class
